top_comments.comment: Plot twist: the reason he left was because his mom walked in on him screaming. I think you know what happens next :)

comments_since_last_sample.body: Plot twist: the reason he left was because his mom walked in on him screaming. I think you know what happens next :)
and like that, Berdly warped worlds without a portal and from his sheer rage alone and became the most powerful being in the universe
